net.sf.JRecord.IO

Class BinTextReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.JRecord.IO.AbstractLineReader
      • net.sf.JRecord.IO.LineByteRecordReaderWrapper<IByteReader>
        • net.sf.JRecord.IO.LineReaderWrapper
          • net.sf.JRecord.IO.BinTextReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IReadLine

    public class BinTextReader
extends LineReaderWrapper
    This class will read and AbstractLine from a standard Windows/*nix Text file. It is similar in function to TextLineReader, the difference being TextLineReader uses Standard BufferedReader (String based) Class to the reading and can not handle Hex (i.e. x'FF') values correctly, while this class uses streams and is able to handle Hex values. This class is based on ByteTextReader.

    This class was written to support hex field (x'FF') separators in csv (delimited) files.

    Version:
    0.68
    Author:
    Bruce Martin
    See Also:
    TextLineReader, ByteTextReader
